name: Antasia 0.7.5 Halloween
description:
For Antasia 0.7.5 (The version on this page), there is creative mode, a nice open sandbox world, where you can't die, and have access to all of the blocks and as many as you want.

Celebrating Halloween, there has been a Halloween Update. You can now enter the Underworld (Ethur) where there are Zombie Ants, Skeleton Ants, Ethur Wolves, Hogs, Ethur Fortresses, and two new types of trees.

For later versians, there will be other modes, so follow me on instagram (https://www.instagram.com/jackieboi527/), youtube (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp0GG0buZU6OiAp9dQbQc2A), and my website (https://jacksonnorton51.wixsite.com/jcnconsoles)!
